# This is a guide on how to use the files in the /templates folder

The following are the files for AI and how to use them:
- AGENTS.md - Documentation requirements
    This is for AI that uses a AGENTS.md file (Copilot).

CLAUDE.md - Documentation requirements
    Should be similar to AGENTS.md, but for Claude

- REVIEW_PHASES.md - Review methodology
    How to create and review documents

- TASK_AGENT_GUIDE.md - How to use task agents (for you to learn)

- CREDIT_OPTIMIZATION.md - Token-saving strategies (for you to reference)
